actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill for the relief of land grantors in Henderson, Union, and Webster Counties, to the United States, and their heirs.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to individuals (or their heirs) in full satisfaction or claims arising out of the sale of land in Kentucky to the United States under threat of condemnation for a military training camp.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of land grantors in Henderson, Union, and Webster Counties, to the United States, and their heirs.
